Key Match Events: Malik Beasley scored 20 points, including seven in the fourth quarter to help Detroit Pistons win
Miscellaneous Highlights: Detroit Pistons are 2-0 in the group stage of the in-season tournament
Others: Jakob Poeltl had a double-double with 25 points and 19 rebounds for Toronto Raptors
RJ Barrett scored 22 points for Toronto Raptors
